channel.title: GUI on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GUI on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Make a drawing quiz with kivy+PyTorch
item.description: #Summary This article is the second day of Docomo Advent Calendar. Do you know the drawing quiz? It is a quiz in which the questioner draws a picture and guesses what other people are drawing. There are many apps. If you recognize the image drawn by the user and guess it, you can play it alone, so PyTorchofthemachinelearninglibrarywillcontinue.//pytorch.org/)andkivy, a library that can create apps, will be combined. What is # kivy?

item.title: [Python] [GUI with Python] PyQt5 -Paint-
item.description: [Last time](http://qiita.com/Algebra_nobu/items/803b5595938b17d90a21) continued Painting I will summarize this site in Japanese. [Paint of letters] #!/usr/bin/python3 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- import sys from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QWidget, QApplication from PyQt5.QtGui import QPainter, QColor, QFont from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt class Example(QWidget): def __init__(self): super().__init__() self.initUI() def initUI(self): self.text = u'\u041b\u0435\u0432\u041d\u0438\u043a\u043e\u043b\u0430\ \u0435\u0432\u0438\u0447\u0422\u043e\u043b\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0439: \n\ \u0410\u043d\u043d\u0430\u041a\u0430\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0438\u043d\u0430' self.setGeometry(300, 300, 280, 170) self.setWindowTitle('Draw text') self.show() # Event handler for drawing def paintEvent(self, event): qp = QPainter() Write a method to paint between the # begin and end methods qp.
